findWorkflow

com.percussion.services.workflow.data.PSWorkflow findWorkflow(int id)
Finds a workflow by id.

Parameters:
id - the workflow id
Returns:
the workflow or null if not found.

                                                                int state)
Finds the workflow state.

Parameters:
wf - the workflow
state - the state id
Returns:
the workflow state or null if not found.

findWorkflowState

com.percussion.services.workflow.data.PSState findWorkflowState(int workflow,
                                                                int state)
finds the workflow state by Id.

Parameters:
workflow - the workflow id.
state - the state id.
Returns:
the state or null if the state does not exist.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the workflow does not exist.

findWorkflowState

com.percussion.services.workflow.data.PSState findWorkflowState(String contentId)
                                                                throws com.percussion.error.PSException
Finds the workflow state for a content item.

Parameters:
contentId - the content id. Must not be blank.
Returns:
the workflow state or null if the state does not exist.
Throws:
PhotoGalleryException - when the content item is not found.
IllegalArgumentException - when the contentid is not numeric, or when the workflow id of the item is invalid.
com.percussion.error.PSException

findWorkflowStateName

String findWorkflowStateName(String contentId)
                             throws com.percussion.error.PSException
Find the workflow state name

Parameters:
contentId - the content id
Returns:
the name of the workflow state. Never null
Throws:
com.percussion.error.PSException - if the state is invalid.

findWorkflowTransition

com.percussion.services.workflow.data.PSTransition findWorkflowTransition(int workflow,
                                                                          int transid)
Finds a workflow transition from the workflow id and transition id. This does NOT including aging transitions. Convenience method for findWorkflowTransition(PSWorkflow, int).

Parameters:
workflow - the workflow id. Must be a valid workflow.
transid - the transition id.
Returns:
the transition or null if no transition for this id.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the workflow id does not match a known workflow.

findWorkflowAnyTransition

com.percussion.services.workflow.data.PSTransitionBase findWorkflowAnyTransition(int workflow,
                                                                                 int transid)
Finds any workflow transition from the workflow id and transition id. This includes aging transitions. Convenience method for findWorkflowAnyTransition(PSWorkflow, int).

Parameters:
workflow - the workflow id. Must be a valid workflow.
transid - the transition id.
Returns:
the transition or null if no transition for this id.

findWorkflowTransition

com.percussion.services.workflow.data.PSTransition findWorkflowTransition(com.percussion.services.workflow.data.PSWorkflow wf,
                                                                          int transid)
Finds a workflow transition by id. This method finds only regular transitions.

Parameters:
wf - the workflow
transid - the transition id.
Returns:
the transition or null if no transition for this id.

findWorkflowAnyTransition

com.percussion.services.workflow.data.PSTransitionBase findWorkflowAnyTransition(com.percussion.services.workflow.data.PSWorkflow wf,
                                                                                 int transid)
Finds a workflow transition by id. This method finds both regular and aging transitions.

Parameters:
wf - the workflow
transid - the transition id.
Returns:
the transition or null if no transition for this id.

IsWorkflowValid

boolean IsWorkflowValid(String contentId,
                        Collection<String> validFlags)
                        throws com.percussion.error.PSException
Is the workflow state of an item one of the valid ones. The content item state contains a single valid flag. The method checks that this flag is one of the listed ones, comparing with a case insensitive comparison.

Parameters:
contentId - the content id for the item
validFlags - the list of valid flags.
Returns:
true if the content valid value is one of the listed ones.
Throws:
com.percussion.error.PSException

findDestinationState

com.percussion.services.workflow.data.PSState findDestinationState(String contentId,
                                                                   String transitionId)
                                                                   throws com.percussion.error.PSException
Find the destination state for a particular workflow transition. Convenience method for findDestinationState(String, String).

Parameters:
contentId - the content id.
transitionId - the transition id
Returns:
the state where the transition goes. May be null if the transition is not found.
Throws:
com.percussion.error.PSException

findDestinationState

com.percussion.services.workflow.data.PSState findDestinationState(com.percussion.services.workflow.data.PSState state,
                                                                   String transitionId)
                                                                   throws com.percussion.error.PSException
Find the destination state for a workflow transition. This method supports aging transitions as well as regular transitions.

Parameters:
state - the current workflow state
transitionId - the transition id
Returns:
the destination state. May be null if the transition id is not found.
Throws:
com.percussion.error.PSException
